Player History
Earned first career win on 6/22/1985...
Traded from Texas to Los Angeles on 3/4/1986 (Going to LAD: P Matt Williams, P Yorkis Perez, CF Oddibe McDowell. Going to TEX: 2B Greg Brock, 2B Tim Flannery)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/13/1989, off Randy Johnson (MON)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Boston on 5/3/1989 (Going to LAD: P Jim Corsi. Going to BOS: P Milt Hill, P Frank Castillo, P Mike Walters, P Matt E. Williams)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/8/1992 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
